text: Feorlig () is a small crofting settlement on the northwest shore of Loch Caroy near Dunvegan on the Isle of Skye in the Highlands of Scotland and is in the council area of Highland. The village of Harlosh is south, on Harlosh Point. ==References== Crofts in Upper Feorlig Category:Populated places in the Isle of Skye
title: Feorlig
